text: So, Jake, how's working in security? Do you deal with any danger? No, not that much. In the morning, I have to check the security cameras to make sure they are working properly. I have to monitor the entrances and exits at all times. What a responsibility. What else do you do? I can't forget to inspect the alarm systems. They have to be in top condition in case of emergencies. I see. Anything else on your checklist? Yes, I conduct regular security sweeps. It's essential to ensure everything is secure. And what about the security badges? Oh, I have to issue security badges to new employees and I can't forget to revoke access for the people who leave the company. Access control is crucial. These are a lot of responsibilities, Jake. Well, yeah, security is a top priority and I have to make sure everything goes as expected.
